main event: Radar sighting of an unidentified object was reported in Chicago, Illinois on November 8, 1952, but visual confirmation was not possible due to weather conditions.
interesting points: The radar locked onto a target that disappeared before it could be retracked., The sighting lasted approximately 30 minutes., There was only one confirmed witness to the event., The weather conditions were poor, hindering visual observation., The event is part of Project Blue Book investigations.
